column4: if i am dual booting windows and ubuntu do i have to get drivers for ubuntu and if i dont find drivers what will happen my motherboard is from a little known company called kobian and they dont even provide updated drivers
ubuntu should detect all of your mainboard components automatically, if not you will have to tinker a lot...
lets say engineering; finding drivers for it and manually "injecting" them into the system
try booting the live cd, if that works everything is fine
